abstract.text: A request to book the specified ride from your service.
Siri phrases that trigger the booking of a ride
A request to book the specified ride from your service.
The handler interface for booking a ride for the user.
Your app’s response to a request ride intent.
Initializes an intent object with the specified ride information.
Initializes an intent object with the specified ride information.
The name of the ride option selected by the user.
The number of passengers that the ride must accommodate.
The time at which to pick up the user.

inlineContent.text: object when the user asks to book a ride using your app. A ride request intent contains user-supplied information about the ride, such as its starting point and the number of people. Use this intent object to identify possible ride options for the user to choose from and to book the ride after the user confirms it.
To handle this intent, the handler object in your Intents extension must adopt the
protocol. Your handler should confirm the request and create an
object with information about whether your app successfully booked the ride.

When implementing ride-booking support, provide a GeoJSON file with the regions for which you are able to provide rides and upload that file as your app’s Routing App Coverage File in App Store Connect. When it needs to suggest apps capable of providing a ride, Maps uses your coverage information to determine whether it should suggest your app. If you do not provide a coverage file and your app is not installed on the user’s device, Maps does not suggest your app. For information about how to create and upload a Routing App Coverage File, see
lists additional attributes of this intent object.
Users can ask Siri to book a ride in a variety of ways.
provides a few sample phrases in different languages. You can use these phrases during testing to trigger your intents. This list isn’t exhaustive and Siri may recognize many other phrases.
Get me a ride to the airport using
叫一辆车到旧金山机场
我想叫一台出租车从中关村到五道口
喺滴滴出行搵車去舊金山機場
用滴滴出行搵部車去酒店
喺滴滴出行揾车去旧金山机场
用滴滴出行揾部车去酒店
suchen welches mich am Arbeitplatz aufgabelt
welches mich vom Potsdamer Platz mitnimmt
Pídeme un taxi al aeropuerto usando
Trovami un passaggio per l'aeroporto usando <appName>
の車で空港まで行きたい
Cari kenderaan untuk pergi ke Kuala Lumpur menggunakan
Skaff en bil til flyplassen med
Vind een taxi naar de luchthaven via
Chamar um carro para o aeroporto usando
Boka en skjuts till flygplatsen med hjälp av
ฉันต้องการเดินทางไปลาดพร้าวโดยใช้

abstract.text: Siri phrases that trigger the booking of a ride

inlineContent.text: represents the name of the app whose Intents extension books the ride. If your app uses custom names for rides, you can tell Siri about those names in your global vocabulary file.
